mention.text: U.S. President Barack Obama said on Sunday that the rights of Myanmar 's minority Muslim population were not being fully protected and warned that the Southeast Asian country would not succeed if Muslims there were oppressed
the victims of attacks and widespread abuse
Members of Myanmar 's Rohingya Muslim minority
